languages.text: "Конечно. Праздная светская беседа — всегда хотел попробовать". {n}Соломон властно складывает руки на груди, непостижимым образом становясь еще выше ростом и шире в плечах.{/n} "Расскажите о ласераксах, губернатор. Такие любопытные твари — откуда вам удалось их достать?"

traits.locale_text: "И, разумеется, вы документировали импорт данных единиц, губернатор?"

languages.text: "But of course. I have always wanted to try my hand at casual small talk." {n}Solomorne folds his arms imperiously over his chest, somehow becoming even taller in stature and broader in the shoulders.{/n} "Tell me about the laceraxes, Governor. Such fascinating creatures — where did you get them from?"
languages.original_text: "Конечно. Праздная светская беседа — всегда хотел попробовать". {n}Соломон властно складывает руки на груди, непостижимым образом становясь еще выше ростом и шире в плечах.{/n} "Расскажите о ласераксах, губернатор. Такие любопытные твари — откуда вам удалось их достать?"

Such fascinating creatures, where did you get them from?"

Such fascinating creatures — where did you get them from?"

"But of course. I have always wanted to try my hand at casual small talk." {n}Solomorne folds his arms imperiously over his chest, somehow becoming even taller in stature and broader in the shoulders.{/n} "Tell me about the laceraxes, Governor. Such fascinating creatures — where did you get them from?"

languages.text: “当然了，我一直都很有兴趣和别人闲聊。”{n}索罗蒙专横地将双臂交叉在胸前。不知为何，他似乎变得更魁梧了，肩膀也更宽了。{/n}“总督，不如给我介绍一下这些异虎吧？这么迷人的宠物，你是从哪里弄来的？”
languages.original_text: "But of course. I have always wanted to try my hand at casual small talk." {n}Solomorne folds his arms imperiously over his chest, somehow becoming even taller in stature and broader in the shoulders.{/n} "Tell me about the laceraxes, Governor. Such fascinating creatures — where did you get them from?"

traits.locale_text: “当然了，我一直都很有兴趣和别人闲聊。”{n}索罗蒙专横地将双臂交叉在胸前。不知为何，他似乎变得更魁梧了，肩膀也更宽了。{/n}“总督，不如给我介绍一下这些异虎吧？这么迷人的宠物，你是从哪里弄来的？”

languages.text: «Desde luego. Siempre he querido probar eso que llaman conversaciones informales». {n}Solomorne se cruza de brazos imperiosamente, logrando de algún modo parecer aún más alto y ancho de hombros.{/n} «Hábleme de los lacerax, gobernador. Son unas criaturas fascinantes. ¿Dónde los ha conseguido?».
languages.original_text: "But of course. I have always wanted to try my hand at casual small talk." {n}Solomorne folds his arms imperiously over his chest, somehow becoming even taller in stature and broader in the shoulders.{/n} "Tell me about the laceraxes, Governor. Such fascinating creatures — where did you get them from?"

traits.locale_text: «Desde luego. Siempre he querido probar eso que llaman conversaciones informales». {n}Solomorne se cruza de brazos imperiosamente, logrando de algún modo parecer aún más alto y ancho de hombros.{/n} «Hábleme de los lacerax, gobernador. Son unas criaturas fascinantes. ¿Dónde los ha conseguido?».

languages.text: "Ben de hep böyle ayaküstü sohbet etmek istemişimdir." {n}Solomorne, kollarını buyurgan bir tavırla göğsünde kavuşturuyor. Her nasılsa boyu daha uzun ve omuzları daha geniş görünüyor.{/n} "Bana laserakslardan bahsedin Vali Bey. Böylesi büyülü yaratıkları nereden buldunuz?"
languages.original_text: "But of course. I have always wanted to try my hand at casual small talk." {n}Solomorne folds his arms imperiously over his chest, somehow becoming even taller in stature and broader in the shoulders.{/n} "Tell me about the laceraxes, Governor. Such fascinating creatures — where did you get them from?"

traits.locale_text: "Ben de hep böyle ayaküstü sohbet etmek istemişimdir." {n}Solomorne, kollarını buyurgan bir tavırla göğsünde kavuşturuyor. Her nasılsa boyu daha uzun ve omuzları daha geniş görünüyor.{/n} "Bana laserakslardan bahsedin Vali Bey. Böylesi büyülü yaratıkları nereden buldunuz?"

languages.text: 「もちろん。俺はいつも形式張らないささやかなお話で腕試ししてみたかったんだ」{n}ソロモーンは、彼の胸の前で横柄に腕を組み、いくらか身長が高くなり、肩幅が広がったようにさえ見える。{/n}「総督、ラセラックスについて教えてくれ。あんな興味深い生物、どこで手に入れたんだ？」
languages.original_text: "But of course. I have always wanted to try my hand at casual small talk." {n}Solomorne folds his arms imperiously over his chest, somehow becoming even taller in stature and broader in the shoulders.{/n} "Tell me about the laceraxes, Governor. Such fascinating creatures — where did you get them from?"

traits.locale_text: 「もちろん。俺はいつも形式張らないささやかなお話で腕試ししてみたかったんだ」{n}ソロモーンは、彼の胸の前で横柄に腕を組み、いくらか身長が高くなり、肩幅が広がったようにさえ見える。{/n}「総督、ラセラックスについて教えてくれ。あんな興味深い生物、どこで手に入れたんだ？」

languages.text: « Mais je vous en prie. J'ai toujours voulu participer à ce qu'on appelle une conversation informelle. » {n}Solomorne croise les bras sur sa poitrine, ce qui lui donne une stature encore plus impérieuse et imposante.{/n} « Parlez-moi des lacérax, gouverneur. Ce sont vraiment des créatures fascinantes. D'où les tenez-vous ? »
languages.original_text: "But of course. I have always wanted to try my hand at casual small talk." {n}Solomorne folds his arms imperiously over his chest, somehow becoming even taller in stature and broader in the shoulders.{/n} "Tell me about the laceraxes, Governor. Such fascinating creatures — where did you get them from?"

traits.locale_text: « Mais je vous en prie. J'ai toujours voulu participer à ce qu'on appelle une conversation informelle. » {n}Solomorne croise les bras sur sa poitrine, ce qui lui donne une stature encore plus impérieuse et imposante.{/n} « Parlez-moi des lacérax, gouverneur. Ce sont vraiment des créatures fascinantes. D'où les tenez-vous ? »

languages.text: "Aber natürlich. Ich wollte mich schon immer mit belanglosem Smalltalk versuchen." {n}Solomorne verschränkt gebieterisch die Arme vor der Brust und wirkt dadurch noch größer und breiter.{/n} "Erzählt mir von den Laceraxen, Gouverneur. Faszinierende Geschöpfe. Woher habt Ihr sie?"
languages.original_text: "But of course. I have always wanted to try my hand at casual small talk." {n}Solomorne folds his arms imperiously over his chest, somehow becoming even taller in stature and broader in the shoulders.{/n} "Tell me about the laceraxes, Governor. Such fascinating creatures — where did you get them from?"

traits.locale_text: "Aber natürlich. Ich wollte mich schon immer mit belanglosem Smalltalk versuchen." {n}Solomorne verschränkt gebieterisch die Arme vor der Brust und wirkt dadurch noch größer und breiter.{/n} "Erzählt mir von den Laceraxen, Gouverneur. Faszinierende Geschöpfe. Woher habt Ihr sie?"
